name: Hellfall
description:
Hellfall is a downwards platformer, where you play as a demon trying to reach his home on the Seventh Circle of Hell.

Play through 7 white-knuckled levels, each set in a different circle of hell! Fall and bounce through chasms; crush demons beneath your feet; and escape a colossal wall of hellfire! String movement and attacks together into crazy combos, and blaze a trail through hell in style!

It was developed in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48, with the theme of: Deeper and Deeper.

Participating in Ludum Dare 48? Give us a rating!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$235287

Controls:

A/D - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Slide

R. Mouse - Ground pound (when unlocked)

Development Credits:

Programming:

Max Ansell

Additional Programming:

Tom Robson

Design:

Tom Robson, Max Ansell

Art:

Tom Robson
